name: Emiliano Tramontana
content: Prof. Emiliano Tramontana Emiliano Tramontana Full Professor Dipartimento di Matematica e Informatica, Università di Catania Viale A. Doria, 6 -- 95125 Catania - Italy Stanza 39 Blocco III Tel: +39 095 738 3008 tramontana at dmi dot unict dot it Il ricevimento studenti si tiene a distanza sulla piattaforma Teams. L'orario si può concordare inviando un messaggio su Teams o email. Appunti di lezioni Le slide usate durante le lezioni, all'interno dei corsi di Laurea in Informatica, sono disponibili ai seguenti link Ingegneria del Software 9 CFU Triennale Ingegneria dei Sistemi Distribuiti 9 CFU Magistrale Architettura degli Elaboratori 9 CFU Triennale Ingegneria del Software 6 CFU Triennale AA 2008-09 Didattica dell'Informatica II Sissis AA 2007-08 Sistemi Operativi Triennale AA 2004-05 Conferences I'm co-organising the following events at international conferences The 9th Edition of Validating Software for Critical systems (VSC) track at IEEE WETICE to be held on line (virtually in Basque Coast - Bayonne, France), 2021. Deadline for sending contributions is April 15th, 2021 I'm, or I've recently been, a PC member of the following international conferences The Information and Software Technologies (ICIST) Conference to be held in Kaunas, October 14 to 16, 2021 The 2nd Asia Conference on Computers and Communications (ACCC) to be held in Singapore, September 24-27, 2021 The International Conference on Computer Engineering and Artificial Intelligence (ICCEAI) to be held in Shanghai, China, August 27 to 29, 2021 The International workshop on Quality Oriented Reuse of Software (QUORS) at IEEE COMPSAC to be held virtually, July 2021 The 9th Asian Conference on Pattern Languages of Programs, AsianPlop held in Taipei, Taiwan, 2020 The International Conference on Program Comprehension at ICSE, held in Seoul, South Korea, July 13-15, 2020 Several other international conferences have been organised previously Papers A partial list of my research papers can be found here Last updated 1st october 2024
